Articles.Content:
Okay, so I am currently making my first venture into modding, and I've created a _simple_ engine model and texture. Now I have to get it into the game.

Noob questions-

1. I use Unity 4.6.5 right?

2. I have to use "PartTools" right? Do they still work, given they are a little but old now?

If you intend to add any emissive animations (such as the engine bell getting hot), you want version 4.2.2

To get the model in game, see this tutorial by Tiberion:
That vid is updated for 1.0? I assume there might be differences in the way mods were made pre 1.0 and after.

No, nothing changed.

And to DL the partTool : http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/65356-0-23-PartTools?p=1878643&viewfull=1#post1878643

(I need to add the previous version there. Will do later today)
